title: When someone argues about tanks and juggernauts without knowing the difference between them.
body:
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/f1/c8/a7/f1c8a7c9ce62f572552f28a399b2db2f.jpg

Edit: dang it. 

Edit 2: there is so little I can do on my phone to fix this. 

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/300/453/926.jpg

Dang it, Rito.

replies.body:
#The Difference Between Tanks and Juggernauts (For Dummies)

Tank: High amounts of disruption/CC and becomes more and more durable as the game drags on, but they lose most of their threatening damage as well.

Juggernaut: A bit less tanky than a Tank and less CC, but fucks you silly if you get anywhere near them, and _usually_ scales (damage-wise) into the late game better than tanks do.
____
#For any questions regarding this definition(s), please call 818-555-9874 or visit our website at www.nowebsitehere.org for potential asnwers to your questions regarding our product.

People get really riled up about the distinction among the two. While there are gameplay differences, the purpose of each is pretty similar: to tank damage for a carry.

If I were to explain classes to a person new to league I would simply move to the largest category that they could recognize as a gamer.

I wouldn't say "technically {{champion:75}} and {{champion:122}} are a subclass distinct from the tank class which have champions like  {{champion:33}} and  {{champion:111}}."

I would simply say {{champion:75}} is a tank as is {{champion:111}} but they do different things for a team.
This is M&G so I refuse to get technical in your post.
I have never used the boards on my phone is it really that bad

I'm at work and it's my only way to get in. 

My job is really boring with too much free time but too little freedom.
Whatcha do?

Transfers. Basically I get emails and then send emails out to other people to make sure we transfer certain objects. 

I get stuck in a cubicle and I find myself really bored. I can only read fiction books at lunch and writing comes and goes for me (been taking a writing break for the past week). 

So I surf the web to help with my boredom. I've already long become addicted to the forums when I used them for my senior paper in college.
Damn dude gotta say that sounds Dull as hell

It. Really. Is. 

But I get paid and it's my first job after college. So I can't complain too much. 

I need to get better at job hunting.
Its a great start thou it'll look good on your history
Yeah. Hopefully my excel skills can land me a job in story development of something.
I am sure it'll help in someway

I feel you dude. Some people just call them all tanks which makes talking abiut balance more difficult.

i use the 6 original categories because those are still the ones in the client. until the client is updated i will continue to refer to all tank subclasses as tanks. same thing with fighters, assassins, mages, supports, and marksmen.
